course_title: Graphics for Theatre and Film Design - GRAPHICS: T&F D

sections.comments: Basic drawing and painting for Theatre and Film Design. Priority will be given to BFA Design/Production and BA Theatre majors. IF THIS COURSE IS FULL OR BLOCKED PLEASE SIGN UP FOR THE WAITLIST SECTION: THTR 205B - WL1. Once you have registered in the wait list there is no need to contact the Department. Your registration will be switched to the parent section when space becomes available. Preference may be given to Majors, Minors, or Honours students in Theatre or Film. For more information about Department of Theatre and Film wait lists please visit: http://theatrefilm.ubc.ca/undergraduate/undergraduate-courses/how-to-wait-list-a-course/This course will be offered online. Winter Term 1 (September-December) sections will be held online. Classes will include a combination of synchronous (live) and asynchronous activities (such as watching recorded lectures, posting to discussion boards, or completing quizzes). By the start of term, instructors will provide their students with more information on what to expect in their individual sections.

This is a WAIT LIST section for THTR 205b, Section 001. Once you have registered in the wait list there is no need to contact the Department. Your registration will be switched to the parent section when space becomes available. Preference may be given to Majors, Minors, or Honours students in Theatre or Film. For more information about Department of Theatre and Film wait lists please visit: http://theatrefilm.ubc.ca/undergraduate/undergraduate-courses/how-to-wait-list-a-course/
